extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    BMUS students only.
COREQUISITE    MUSC 420/6.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from MUSC 421/6.0; MUSC 425/6.0

basic.description: Students will perform in a public recital in accordance with guidelines established by the School of Music.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Applied Study IV (Performance Recital)
